Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper.constants

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper.constants.Constants

  • public abstract class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    Supplies universal enums and finals for classes to share between each other
    Author:
    Ryan Wiener

        public static int getGridSize​(Constants.Difficulty difficulty)
        links the difficulty enum to grid size

        Returns:

      • getWindowSizes

        public static java.awt.Dimension getWindowSizes​(Constants.Difficulty difficulty)
        links difficulty enum to a Dimension object that contains the width and height of frame
        Parameters:
        difficulty - Difficulty enum member that you want the frame size of
        Returns:
        Dimension object containing the width and height for the passed difficulty.

      • getNumColor

        Given an int it returns the color that it should have.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
